channel.title: Blue dragon platebody and shout gauntlets
channel.description:
figured i would go ahead and show a picture but this is maybe the new blue dragon platebody (theres already a helm and platelegs and stuff but i dont feel like taking pictures of it all :D) im adding to the project, im probably gunna have amy touch it up if she feels its needed, and the big dragon heads on the arms are shout gauntlets which are gunna be a new item in the project. theres a lot of detail i could go into the project about this but i dont feel like it right now its too late for me ha.
well post your opinions made this like a month ago theres a lot of other models but i wanna save them for everyone to see when the project is out. by the way the projects name is "a little piece of heaven".
will post low poly daedric armour me and amy made tomorrow looks boss trust me.
check out our site : alpoh.tk (tk until we feel its time that we actually need our own domain.) the site doesnt have all the projects info on it but ima update it a lot sometime this week so i can keep people updated. well register and join forums also if you want.
[img]http://i.tinyuploads.com/7eExM7.png[/img]

item.title: Blue dragon platebody and shout gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I understand the concept but not sure if it’d fit the RSPS part.

Read full topic
item.source: Blue dragon platebody and shout gauntlets

item.title: Blue dragon platebody and shout gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:5, topic:517811”]Change the color of the dragon heads, give them some more decoration and change the sleeve too thick for RuneScape platebodies :/[/quote][quote=“kirikugi, post:6, topic:517811”]i would change the name. make like a alter ego to the dragon called " serpent " Wyvern " ect. and scale down the dragon heads just a smidge. i think its a tad to big but as for your coloring. the black and blue works real well but me personaly i would add another color to add some more contrast. im not being rude or mean just some Ccs to work with ^^ but this is your model so do with it what you will.

oh and maybe add some sort of object onto the chest to give it some more depth and detail. i could forsee some leather like straps. the brown would give it the contrast it needs. but make sure if you make any major altercations you save a copy of the original. if not you may be stuck with a bad concept. i like to think chest plates are my specialty.[/quote]

thanks for the opinions guys, i agree with the plate its just a basis still gotta add more to it but its a whole seperate model not meant to go with these gauntlets just was there so my friend (i sent him this picture figured id use it as a picture for this post) could see how it was suppost to look on the model but anyways, but if i make the sleeves any thinner the platebodies will show through and actually in game it looks decent i was very happy with how it turned out, i still gotta send it to amy though so she can touch it up a bit if she feels its needed. and also yea i might change the name the reason i made it “shout gauntlets” is because how in skyrim the player can do shouts ima make the special for the gauntlets a mage blast, and there will be many other color forms for this model as well, theres a lot of plans for adding this model into the project to its gunna be a very unqiue feature how we add all our new stuff into the game thanks again though will definitely incorporate ya’lls ideas into this.

Read full topic
item.source: Blue dragon platebody and shout gauntlets

item.title: Blue dragon platebody and shout gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @kirikugi kirikugi
item.description:
@kirikugi wrote:

i would change the name. make like a alter ego to the dragon called " serpent " Wyvern " ect. and scale down the dragon heads just a smidge. i think its a tad to big but as for your coloring. the black and blue works real well but me personaly i would add another color to add some more contrast. im not being rude or mean just some Ccs to work with ^^ but this is your model so do with it what you will.

oh and maybe add some sort of object onto the chest to give it some more depth and detail. i could forsee some leather like straps. the brown would give it the contrast it needs. but make sure if you make any major altercations you save a copy of the original. if not you may be stuck with a bad concept. i like to think chest plates are my specialty.

Read full topic
item.source: Blue dragon platebody and shout gauntlets

item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

amy_webb:

Very interesting, but i’m not sure the glove being that big is smart. We’ll discuss it later, whenever you get on.

the reason the gloves are so big is because they are gunna be considered a weapon
i got the idea from these pictures from god of war

305_realsize.jpg638×864

God+Of+War+3+(All--Things-Here.Blogspot.com)+(8).jpg800×450
